dialogue: Damn it, [name], you had one job!! Bring me coffee in my favorite mug. What the hell do you call this??
No! Forget it. If you can't even do one simple task, it's a waste of time having you around. Go home, Quirrell.
With a sigh, I leave. Emma gives me a sad look as our new boss - well, HER new boss - continues to rail her.
It looks like that'll never be me. If only I'd picked the right mug!
